title: Teleop Walk Mode based on AtllasSimInterfaceCommand message

content.raw:
Update / create new teleop walk mode based on [AtlasSimInterfaceCommand message](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/1ccfde1621e7e9555b1dc2d35877db60dcd39b81/atlas_msgs/msg/AtlasSimInterfaceCommand.msg?at=default).

 1. Teleport the robot to its new foot pose without changing joint configuration.
 1. Attach commanded foot to inertial world by fixed constraint.
 1. Disable collision checks and contact joints for corresponding foot (and all leg links) with other collision objects in the world.

Potential future improvement:  playback a predefined joint velocity trajectory for leg links from the pelvis down to mimic walking motion.
content.html:
Update / create new teleop walk mode based on AtlasSimInterfaceCommand message.

  1. Teleport the robot to its new foot pose without changing joint configuration.
  2. Attach commanded foot to inertial world by fixed constraint.
  3. Disable collision checks and contact joints for corresponding foot (and all leg links) with other collision objects in the world.

Potential future improvement: playback a predefined joint velocity trajectory for leg links from the pelvis down to mimic walking motion.
